name: send_email
description: Send an email with optional HTML formatting, CC/BCC, and attachments (up to 25MB total)

arguments.name: body
arguments.desc: Email body content (plain text or HTML)

name: draft_email
description: Create an email draft for later editing or sending

name: read_email
description: Retrieve full email content including headers and attachments by message ID

name: search_emails
description: Search emails using Gmail search syntax (e.g., 'from:user@example.com', 'is:unread', 'subject:hello')

name: modify_email
description: Add or remove labels from an email message

name: delete_email
description: Permanently delete an email (cannot be undone)

name: list_email_labels
description: List all Gmail labels (system and custom)

name: create_label
description: Create a new custom Gmail label

name: get_or_create_label
description: Get an existing label or create it if it doesn't exist

name: batch_modify_emails
description: Modify labels for multiple emails at once (up to 50 per batch, auto-chunks larger requests)

arguments.name: add_labels
arguments.desc: Labels to add to all messages

arguments.name: remove_labels
arguments.desc: Labels to remove from all messages

name: batch_delete_emails
description: Permanently delete multiple emails at once with detailed reporting

arguments.name: message_ids
arguments.desc: Array of Gmail message IDs to delete

name: create_filter
description: Create a Gmail filter with custom criteria and automated actions

arguments.name: criteria
arguments.desc: Filter criteria (from, to, subject, query, etc.)

arguments.name: action
arguments.desc: Actions to perform (addLabelIds, removeLabelIds, forward, etc.)

name: get_filter
description: Get details of a specific filter

name: create_filter_from_template
description: Create a filter from predefined templates (newsletters, subject, attachments, large_emails, mailing_lists)

name: download_attachment
description: Download an email attachment to a specified directory
